Description: Arabic inscription, Islamic inscription in field, Islamic inscription in margin, within plain circle. (obverse)
Arabic inscription, Quranic inscription in field, legend in margin indicating date struck, within plain circle. (reverse)
Bibliographic references: BMC Oriental (Arab-Byzantine) / A catalogue of the Arab-Byzantine and post-reform Umaiyad coins (200, p.88)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2018, 6 May- 30 June, National Museum, New Delhi, India and the World: A History in Nine Stories 2017-2018, 10 Nov 2017 - 18 Feb 2018, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya (CSMVS), Mumbai, India, India and the World: A History in Nine Stories
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Hon Sir Charles Augustus Murray
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Isma'il Pasha, Viceroy of Egypt
